JobFullDesc: SAP Implementation Sr. Consultant  Work you'll do  Work with our clients to assist in the implementation of large scale SAP systems. Lead task and projects to ensure the success of the project is obtained. Expand your business and technical knowledge to grow your career and take it to the next level.  The team  SAP  Our SAP team focuses on design, implementation, and on-going operations and maintenance of SAP applications and technology. Professionals will have hands-on access and exposure to the latest technologies and thought leaders. We work with clients who want to improve their ability to react on digital world and enable scalability, remove performance barriers, enable innovation, and modernize core systems and reimagine their business with SAP digital solutions. Applications include SAP S/4HANA and Cloud (Hybris, Ariba, IBP, SuccessFactors, and SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud) across the following capabilities:  • Finance  • Supply Chain  • Customer and Sales Operations  • Technology (Mobility and User Experience, Cloud and Virtualization, Data Management and Analytics) * Travel up to 80% is required for this role (While 80% of travel is a requirement for this role, due to COVID 19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice).
